reviewText: Koyu Ohara directed this bizarre, beautifully filmed piece of erotica about a strong young woman who is forced to enter a convent where perversion and vice rule.  Sister Lucia is surrounded by hypocritical nuns, who preach about the sins of pleasure, but indulge in every sexual act behind closed doors.  The character Lucia reminds me of the "renegade nun" from "School of the Holy Beast" with her tough attitude and her smart, sarcastic comments.  She is a strong female character and fun to watch.  The thin story centers on 2 thugs who are hiding out in the convent after escaping from prison.  they soon charm the sex starved young nuns, who decide to protect the two convicts, who have repeatedly raped them.  When the corrupt Mother Superior discovers the secret, the nuns blame Lucia, and accuse her of being a child of Satan! more hypocrisy.  This nunsploitation entry features more sex than "Wet Rope," but that also means "less story."  Still "Sins of Sister Lucia" is a very strong entry in the genre, and the fact that Mondo Macabro even released such a rare title is something to be grateful for.  This is bound to be a collectors item.

Sins of Sister Lucia (1978)- One of the few but significant nunsploitation flix emerging from Japan, along the lines of  the fabulous 'School Of The Holy Beast' (1974) by Norifumi Suzuki (Star Of David:Beautiful Girl Hunter), this entry is a lot like its European counterparts from that time period, and all of these films hail from the womb of Ken Russell`s wickedly wonderful 'The Devils' (1971). After seducing her English teacher and stabbing one of her father`s hoodlum pals, Rumika is sent to a convent to clean her act up. Well, not so much. This convent is a 'hotbed' of deviant nuns who engage in strange spanking games, bondage, lesbian encounters, catfighting, etc. and the Mother Superior is screwing the parish Priest. And all of this happens before two escaped male prisoners break into the convent and begin 'servicing' the nun`s needs...whew. "If God wills it" indeed. Lots of indelible imagery and nudity for a 'naughty nun' flick, and Mondo Macabro always gives us loads of extras, this time several featurettes about the film, nunsploitation, the director, Nikkatsu Studio releases, and a slew of trailers. Big Fun. Praise the Lord. Amen.
